Constructor Detail

MetaMeta

public MetaMeta()
         throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Create a new MetaMeta-Controller

This constructor will initialize it's own XMLHelper, TemplateManager and ConnectionManager.

Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - throws a ParserConfigurationException (if, for example, your JRE is seriously fucked up) since it can't live without a # DocumentBuilder.

Perform a GET request.

init

public void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig servletConfig)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
This is called by the Webserver to put the servlet into service.

This' init() basically does 4 things: (1) load and (2) evaluate the configuration given by the servlets context, (3) load all modules specified in that configuration and open a connection to the database using a ConnectionManager created while constructing the Servlet.

Specified by:
init in interface javax.servlet.Servlet
Overrides:
init in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException

isModuleLoaded

Check if a given Module is loaded

Parameters:
module - The Name of the Module (not it's qualified Name)
Returns:
true or false.
